name: Rachel West
text: Working with The Rainbow Balloon Company was awesome! We were needing some centerpieces for our Dunkin' Grand Opening at 2419 Acton Road, Vestavia Hills, AL, and what we got was above and beyond what we were expecting. This is our second time using them for a Grand Opening and a second time we were incredibly happy! The team was easy to work with and they went above and beyond to help us!

name: Jonathan Fudge
text:
The Rainbow Balloon Company is our go-to balloon decor company in Birmingham, Alabama and we absolutely LOVE their work. Whether we are trying to book a client for organic garland or for the every growing in popularity yard decor, they are amazing to work with. I highly recommend them.

They even offer YARD CARDS! We are so excited to have found them and been able to work with them. Our staff ran into them at a convention where the owner of The Rainbow Balloon Company was winning first place after first place awards for her balloons. Well deserved! If you found this company, consider yourself lucky and give them a call. You won't find anyone better in the greater Birmingham area.

name: Cliff Jones
text: I was referred to The Rainbow Balloon Company by a friend and used them for my wife's 40th Birthday. Not only did they do a PHENOMENAL JOB, but their customer service was top notch and everything was handled in a very professional manner!  I HIGHLY RECOMMEND them for any occasion!  You wont be disappointed!

name: Jessica Lee Ramos
text: Jessica and Mary did an amazing job setting up a birthday display for my twin boys turning 10.  They will work with you to get everything just right with balloon colors to coordinate with the yard signs.  Super friendly!  I will definitely refer them to my friends and plan to use them again. Thank you Rainbow Balloon Company!

name: Arturo Briseno Jr
text: With everyone being stuck at home for COVID (so no classroom birthday parties), we wanted to do something special for our little one's birthday this year.  We ordered a Classic Celebration Marquis from The Rainbow Balloon Company and loved it.  They offer different services but for us the marquis was perfect...  something a little different (and in her favorite colors) to brighten up her day.  Highly recommend checking them out!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words! We hope your daughter had a great birthday!!!

name: Julie Bean
text: Fantastic experience working with these fun, talented women! They make the whole process...from planning to delivery/setup....efficient and easy. Their work is beautiful. Highly recommend!

name: Sandra Remington
text: So easy to work with and very responsive! Yard signs and balloons looked wonderful and added such a special cheer to our birthday boy’s day. We will definitely be using them again!

name: Kristin Bundren
text: We love Rainbow Balloon Company! We have ordered from them twice this year (a birthday and New Years) and the balloons were fabulous! The balloon art adds a fun, colorful, and festive touch. Great communication and product! We are looking forward to more in the future!!

name: Olivia Horan
text: If you come to any Diamonds Direct event and see our gorgeous balloon garlands -- these ladies need to get all the credit! Fabulous job every time, and they have a knack for bringing your visions to life :) Highly recommend for any event, big or small!

resp.text: Always a pleasure working with you!!! :D

name: Ashlee Ammons
text:
I found this awesome company after a Google search, I wanted to surprise my Mom with something positive on my Grandmothers 1st birthday following her passing this year.  Although they are known for celebratory occasions they really worked with me to create something with the appropriate tone to make my Mom feel special on an otherwise somber day.  My Mom was deeply touch by this and cried and smiled all weekend long.  The ladies at RBC were wonderful to work with, I accidentally gave them the incorrect address to the house and they communicated with me quickly and got it set and delivered the WOW
as promised!  I would highly recco them, if I need anything further, they will be my 1st call!  Last, they just kinda seem like awesome humans, they were kind, friendly and personable throughout!

name: ShuMarri Jennings
text: They were very professional. They all had great attitudes and the great work ethic. They made sure our event was everything we imagined.

name: Magic City Cheer & Tumble
text: Great company! Easy to work with- gave us exactly what we asked for. Great product.

name: Amanda Austin
text: Very responsive, easy to work with, and did a wonderful job decorating our yard for our daughter's birthday!

name: Deidra K. Diaz
text: I am so thankful I got a Facebook recommendation to use the Rainbow Balloon Company!   Your creativity and decor is SO MUCH better than just having big letters on the lawn.  The custom colors, bright and vivid design and personal touch was exactly what we wanted to celebrate my Mom's 71st Birthday during the Covid-19 pandemic.  I can't say THANK YOU enough, with a special nod to Chandler who was exceptional customer servixe!   Wow...your company is amazing!

name: Ann Katherine Hardeman
text: Excellent service! Amazing balloons!  A pleasure to work with, and so helpful!

name: Steven Hughes
text: This is my next door neighbor.  Nice folks.

name: Brandon Mullins
text: Best balloon designer in the state

text: This is my next door neighbor.  Nice folks.

name: Brandon Mullins
text: Best balloon designer in the state

name: Bonnie Shoultz
text:
I have not had the pleasure to shop at Lush personally. However, after watching Tim’s videos and his heartfelt love and concern for not only his business, but, other small businesses during this time of uncertainty, I would just love to hug him and pledge my business to Lush!
Tim, your heart is absolutely precious and your Mother would be so proud ❣️

resp.text: OMG... you brought tears to my eyes...  it's been such a hard 12 months for so many...  your kindness to take the time to send this is very much appreciated.   Tim

name: Caryn Janecky
text: Highly recommend their class! So fun!

name: Kathleen Kerns
text: I am not local and needed two plant arrangements delivered to two different locations after the loss of a loved one.  I called, and Susan was so helpful - she shared with me in clear detail what my available options were.  Ultimately, I entrusted her with the selection and design.  The recipients sent pictures of the delivered arrangements, and they were exactly what I had in mind!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your positive experience.  We are a small local business and are very grateful for you and so happy you are pleased.

name: cross nic
text: The Lilys bloomed today!!!!!!   I live 1,300 miles away and they helped get an arrangement to my mom. It was beautiful and spectacular and made her smile like she deserves, especially on Mother's Day. THANK YOU

name: Carolyn Davis
text: Gorgeous flower arrangements and the best place to stop for one of a kind gifts.  The candles smell delicious.

name: Sonya Bumpers
text:
All of my floral designs, aromatic candles and delivery experiences with Lush Home and Garden Event Center have been nothing but exceptional.
I live in Birmingham and have placed orders over the phone including my payments and the experience was without fault.
Tim Burt, and his amazing staff have gone above and beyond in surprising my Aunts,  Uncles, Girlfriends and Father.
Thanks, for phenomenal customer service and all the love that is put into each order and delivery.
My Aunt still smiles about the day of her delivery arrived, the  arrangements was beautiful of course, however she seemed more delighted in the handsome youngman in his apron bring the delivery, this made her day.
When your business is so designed to bring joy and delight to others, it is indeed a pleasure when that if filled to the utmost and the purchaser feels good also.
To the Lush Management and Staff.
I Wish You Enough!

Sonya Bumpers

resp.text: Wow!   Thank you Sonya... your support over the years means more than you will ever know and taking the time to review us means a lot..

name: Brock Killingsworth
text: Lush is the best. Always friendly, always great flowers, always fantastic gift ideas.

name: Alexandrea West
text: Lush is my favorite place to shop for everything from candles, to home lighting, to thoughtful and unique gifts. The service is always above and beyond the norm. I appreciate their creative input and always trust that anything I go to them for will be above and beyond my expectations.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to review us!!  So pleased that you are happy with your experience and we look forward to working with you in the future... we also admire your fabulous work...  Thanks again...

name: Bobbi Sue Thomas
text: Lush is such a breathe of fresh air in Midtown Mobile. The owner, Tim, is so personable and always so kind. I can always find the perfect gift for any occasion and they always go the extra mile to wrap it beautifully. Cannot say enough good things about this store. It is wonderful!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for saying these wonderful things...    As a locally owned business we couldn't make it without the support of our regular customers.  We try hard to go the extra mile with fresh flowers on our gift wrap and walking folks to their car... because we actually love what we do!  So grateful you took the time to rate us!

name: Henry Hudson
text: Thank you so much for arranging a last minute beautiful bouquet and delivering it so quickly with just a phone call!! My best friend loves it and it made her smile when her birthday wasn’t going so great.

name: Sarah Baxter
text: Thank you LUSH!! I had a horrible experience from ordering flowers from FTD.com. I purchased $100 bouquet for my cousin, and they sent a dreadful arrangement (that looked like it came from Walmart). I immediately called LUSH to see if they could send the flowers my cousin deserved. I am still in awe of the arrangement Tim and his team created. I will never make the mistake of using anyone other than LUSH again.

resp.text: Sarah... Thank you so much for taking the time to review us.  We are so grateful we were able to please you and look forward to working with you again...

name: Susan Cook
text: Incredible work with an amazing staff!! Perfectly located in downtown Mobile but flexible with punctual deliveries. 10/10 would recommend!

name: Luke Boothe
text:
I’ve been to Lush numerous times for flowers and gifts and have never had anything that wasn't
nothing but beautiful. Their arrangements are the best in Mobile. The staff is super friendly.
KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK LUSH!!!

resp.text: Thank you Luke for such a great review!

name: Ashley Gunter
text: Absolutely one of the most elegant and beautiful shops in Mobile,Al.

resp.text: What a wonderful thing to say.  We will continue to try and live up to your praise!!   Thank you for taking the time to review us!!

name: Jillian Rosandich
text: LUSH is a beautifully curated space and such a joy to browse (I could spend hours!), especially thanks to the luxe scented candles and floral arrangements. Tim, the owner, is so kind and really knows his stuff. This is a true midtown destination and a must-stop shop for anyone that loves home decor.

resp.text: Oh My Goodness!  Thank you so much for taking the time to express this .  It means so much to me and my team.  As a local business we work hard to be a place everyone enjoys shopping. We want to be known as the "where did you get that?" store.   Again your kind words are much appreciated... Tim

name: Courtney Mcdonald
text: I love this place sooo much!! It’s the perfect place for gifts, or home decor! And the customer service is over the top!! I came in the Friday before Christmas for a last minute gift, and everyone so nice, especially for it to have been as busy as it was! I felt like just hanging out for a while and chatting because everyone was just so friendly!! The gift set I purchased was already wrapped really cute but they took the extra time to “spruce” up the bag even more! It’s the little things like that, that make shopping experiences so much better than other places. This is now my go-to spot for gifts and such!! Thanks Lush!! I have been sure to tell everyone about this little hidden gem!

resp.text: Wow!! Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a lovely review.  I have a great staff and we love what we do.  This review will make everyone’s day!!

name: Jennifer Pool
text: What a wonderful experience! Excellent customer service, amazing flower arrangements and a beautiful store full of wonderful gifts!! I cannot say enough about Lush - Tim and Jonathan were just the best! Lush is a jewel - you must visit!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to review us and we are so grateful for your kind words...  Next time you are in we want to treat you to one of our Coastal Candles   on us!!!  Thanks again.... Tim

name: Boyd McGehee
text: This store is a gem for the state of Alabama! One of a kind.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to review .  And such an amazing compliment...because i know you are well traveled and to give us such high praise we are very grateful..

name: sara lee
text: Amazing and different looking arrangements.  Beautiful selection of houseware lighting and furniture too.  I sent their Mardi Gras candle off to my adult kids to remind them of home.

resp.text: Thank you so much!!

name: Hiram Young
text: I went to a boarding school in the area and Lush is my go to place for corsages for school dances. The ones I got always looked MILES better than those of the same price from other local florists, and the people working the desk and making the corsages will talk to you and look at pictures of your dates dress and your tux and discuss your color and design options.

resp.text: Thank you. So happy you were pleased!

name: Laila Boucher
text: The BEST service and store in Mobile! I just love my treasures from this store!

resp.text: THANK YOU SO MUCH!!  So nice of you to take the time to review us!

name: Geaux LSU
text: Gorgeous place with very nice pretty things! But the customer service was not great! Walked in was in awe of how nice the store was...A guy was on the phone he didn't try to acknowledge  my sister-in-law and I ...We stood there for 3 Min and still no "Give me a sec", "It'll be one min"! I would've understood if he would've just at least "Hi, how are you" but nothing was said! So we politely walked out! When we really wanted to purchase things!

resp.text: I saw you look through the windows... I checked our cameras and never saw you enter the store... Would love to speak with ... Thanks  Tim

name: Stephen Page
text: I will try post the picture I just took of the wilted sunflowers delivered by "Lush". Unfortunate that someone within this company decided to deliver wilted flowers to a funeral. They conveniently left the shops name and address for me to find quickly on Google.

resp.text: When the arrangement was delivered yesterday it was fresh and gorgeous. We received a call today from the funeral home that the heat had wilted them. We sent one of our designers out immediately at no cost and completely redid the arrangementNot sure what else we could have done.   Please show that pic.

name: Emma Peace
text: Owner Tim is delightful. He has beautiful items that everyone would love.

resp.text:
Thank you!   We try so hard and we appreciate your continued support!

Tim

name: Rebecca Kramer
text: I received a beautiful arrangement on my birthday this year from my daughter. I can't wait to go purchase something from Lush for her birthday.

resp.text: Thank you so much. We really appreciate your business and we  are glad u loved ur arrangement!

name: Rob Bright
text: Best store in Mobile & Tim is fantastic!!!

resp.text: Thank you Rob..  I appreciate you taking the time to review us!

name: BrotherTy Page
text: The best florist in MOBILE!

resp.text: Thank you so much for saying that.  We really make it our goal on EVERY arrangement to please the customer and put a smile on their face.  I am grateful for your taking the time to give us such a positive review..  Tim

name: Jack Pierre
text: Fantastic candles and extraordinary floral work

resp.text: Thank you so much!!

name: RegularGamer PlayZ
text: Very rude costumer service! Was told my son could not have a seat in there store! I felt it was a racist comment for sure!!!!

resp.text: So sorry you felt that way.  We have signs posted on most every chair to not sit...mostly meant for children...because we sell upholstery off the floor and must keep it "unused"   Please don't feel that you were singled out... trust me you were not...  we regular ask folk to please not sit unless they are actually interested in purchasing the chair they wish to sit in.

name: Tim Sowell
text: Pope tents went over and above. They performed so very well for my daughter's wedding. There are people you call when you need things for a special event. This company is one I would call and recommend to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us help with your daughters wedding!!

name: Tina Miller
text: Aaron was very pleasant to talk to and met our party needs, will rent from again 😀

resp.text: Thanks!!!

name: Katie Moll
text: If you need a price quote theyll get you ine fast. Good prices. If i was going to use an event rental itd be them. My plans just changed.

resp.text: Thanks!!

name: Justin Jernigan
text: We rented tables and chairs from Pope Tent Rental for our wedding. They were on time with delivery, very friendly people, and easy to work with! - Tori Jernigan

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!!

name: Vickie Perez
text: Great

name: Destiny L
text:
I am a long time customer of Camile's, not because of the food, but because it is right next door to campus. I sometimes like to sit and grab a bite between classes. The food is bit bland, but I have never had any problems with my order. One day I did and was treated horribly for the complaint. I ordered the Camile club with no mayo. When I received my sandwich, it had mayo. So, I calmly went back up and explained that I didn't want mayo. I was told it could be fixed.

While waiting on my sandwich, I noticed the staff watching me and speaking quietly, but I ignored it. 5 minutes later I was called back and when I went to check my sandwich again, I noticed the residue from mayo. It looked as if someone had wiped the mayo off and changed the bread. Again, calmly, I went back up (once again noticing the staff snickering) and asked to speak to the manager for a refund. Said-manager whose name I couldn't get, claimed she was there the whole time they "remade" my sandwich and it was fresh. I told her that couldn't be the case because it was now cold, it took her less time to make it than originally and I showed her a piece of lettuce that had mayo in it.

She then rudely asked me if I still had my receipt, which I did. I was given a refund, but I don't appreciate the way I was treated. If I'm paying for a meal, I expect it to made the way I requested it. I didn't ask them to make me a sandwich befitting God. I just didn't want mayo.  I am never stepping foot into that cafe again.

name: Carrol Steakley
text:
I rarely order flowers and I am not happy with the whole teleflora website/florist experience. I feel that I should be able to pick out  a picture of the flowers and container that I would like to purchase, pay for it, and have it delivered. When I order an item, let's say a new chair,  I can see a photo of the  chair and know what I am paying for ,and when it arrives it should be the chair I ordered. I don't like paying for something that is NOT what I ordered. While I understand fresh flowers may need to be substituted the arrangement should resemble the photo. Flowers should be similar and the container should be exact.  A container should not be in a photo on the website if it is not " in stock". This is false advertising. Each individual florist probably doesn't have what is pictured on the Teleflora websites.
I called the florist and expressed my concern and followed up with an email with pictures of what I ordered and what was delivered.  I ordered a beautiful sturdy white wicker basket with flowers and what I got was a cheap multicolored Easter egg basket. They substituted the basket and after I complained they were willing to offer me a credit of $2.50. What a joke!  I will not use this florist in the future for any reason and will never use a site that is managed by Teleflora. My thoughts are that the Teleflora company has way too many florist and they do not know what each flower shop has in stock. So when you order from a site like this one, you NEVER KNOW WHAT YOU ARE GOING TO GET. BEWARE. I wish I could put a photo on this commentary. I paid $45.73 for something that was NOT what I ordered.  Here is the response from the florist:

Thank you for your recent order. We pride ourselves on delivering the best, most fresh and most similar arrangements that we can for our customers and we have been doing so for over 38 year in the Shoals area! I am very glad you were pleased with the flowers that we provided for you and your mother.

In response to your recent request for a 50% refund here is our answer:
The basket chosen was unavailable and a similar value was substitute per our substitution policy.
We were also instructed to call and leave on the front porch if no one was available. Which we did. Our standard policy is to call and if there is no response, and no one is home, we leave a message as to where the flowers are. Since we were instructed, by you, to leave them, they were; only after a phone call was made. Had you not told us to leave the arrangement, and weather was not good for our arrangement, we would have left a message detailing where the arrangement could be picked up.
Also, you did not order from a 3rd party person. You placed your order on our website, which is managed and updated by Teleflora. They are our wire service and website managing team. They have thousands of florists that they service and we all obviously have different items in stock. They do a generic picture, and when a picture is chosen we try to fill the order as best we can with the flowers we have on hand at that particular time. Flowers are very seasonal and have a high turnover because of spoilage. Next time, a  call directly to the florist could save you a substitution since you would know immediately what they had available at that time.

As far as using another florist, they would offer the same substitution policy as us, so I don't know that you would've been happier.

Since you were happy with the flowers provided in the arrangement and they were Pretty and Fresh I can NOT offer you a 1/2 refund of the product, being as though you were please with it. I will however refund you the "basket" charge since you were not pleased with the substitution chosen. I will be adding a refund of the Full container charge of $2.50 to your card. I hope this helps.
Thank you for your business.

name: Muscle Shoals Florist

We were telling a story about how my dad loved, I mean love pringles snack pack chips, he would hide them under his hat and in his pants pockets and go to his room with them at night.
Well, unbeknownst to me and my family,  the day of his service they had brought out a beautifully framed photo of pringles chips inscribed with in loving memory.  This touched our hearts in more ways than you could imagine.  Not only did they show us compassion during our time of need, they actually listened to our stories and made our day more bearable.
Kudos to Mobile Memorial Gardens

name: Chad Buckhalter
text: I can’t say enough good things about Mobile Memorial Gardens, they were very caring and compassionate during our time of grief. The people especially were so understanding, patient and very attentive to our needs. The facilities and the service was very nice, I would highly recommend them.

name: Donna laws
text: Clay Thomaston made my experience dealing with my sweet mother’s passing one that i will  always remember. The one thing I dreaded most was sitting at the funeral home discussing her arrangements. Clay has a calmness he brings to the table, he’s  patient and was very supportive of my thoughts and wishes. I would highly recommend Mobile Memorial Gardens for their loved ones arrangements.

name: Denise Stringer
text: Staff are caring, considerate and attention to detail was impressive. I could not have asked for better for my loved one.  Martin and Doris were extremely kind and helpful in every aspect. Elizabeth has reached out to us as well to offer her support and give words of encouragement. Loss is never easy but it was calming to know my mother was in such wonderful hands.

text: Mobile Memorial Gardens provided caring and compassionate assistance at a very difficult time. Everyone I encountered was very professional and extremely kind and  I would highly recommend them when you have to deal with the passing of a loved one.

text: I can't say enough about the caring, compassionate service my family received from Mobile Memorial Gardens Funeral Home. My mother passed in 2017 and my father in June 2020. I can remember my mother talking about how helpful and friendly the staff were when she and my father were making their arrangements. It felt as if my family was part of the Mobile Memorial Gardens' family. Even down to little things such as holding and caring for the flowers and plants until I could get back there to pick them up. Little things, but those small acts of kindness make all the difference in the world. I am currently starting the process of taking care of my pre-arrangements. There is no one I trust more than Mobile Memorial Gardens Funeral Home.

name: Terri McNellage
text:
Worked with Sid on our mother's recent funeral arrangements.  He was great to work with and helped us walk through the process. My parents had pre-arranged their funerals in 1993 and things were different then however he worked it all out and completed our funeral needs as written.  Memorial Gardens Funeral Home honored the written policy (However, Memorial Garden Cemetery didn’t do the same - they were one company in 1993 but now they are two totally different companies) The Funeral Home stood by the prearrangements from 1993. however the Cemetery did not. But thankfully the Funeral home stepped up and covered the difference when the Cemetery tried to charge us over and above the prearrangements written agreement. Buyer beware!
Sidney again was great to work with in person, by phone, text and/or email (even over a holiday)

The day of the service everyone was very helpful and respectful of our needs and assisted us in doings things the way our mother would have wanted.

Thank you Sid for your kindness and understanding!

Thank you for the time and concern you gave us during this time.

text: this is a nice cemetery. Well kept and nice staff people.

text: Cemetery charges $6700 seem legitimate. Funeral home charges about$10,500 seem excessive. Total over $17,000. For a modest funeral. I feel like I was taken to the cleaners by a used car dealer.

name: Riley Brenes
text: Funeral homes are notoriously underhanded. Everyone knows someone who has been manipulated into ridiculous costs while grieving. Apparently additions abound when it comes to closing the casket on life. Surprisingly, I didn’t feel pressured into anything or swayed or even the slightest swindle from Memorial Gardens to spend. There I was-  a 32yr old, young father, barely  getting my “adulting” abilities in check when suddenly, I found myself having to navigate the funerary process solo for my late grandmother. Thankfully; Buffy, Nick, and Elizabeth at MG made it simple, affordable, and exactly how my uniquely particular grandmother would have wanted it. I’m thankful for their help and recommend MG to everyone. In the midsts of the fly-by-night funerary groups in town, there is a reason MG has been under the same management for decades: they sincerely care about families and it shows in the way they do business. Truly a blessing to Mobile County.

resp.text: Our passion to help those in need is why we get up every day and help families like yours.  We truly appreciate your trust in us to care for you and you loved one through this process.

name: Chelsea Madren (OC Food Diva)
text:
Bruschetta made with a balsamic reduction, tomatoes, basil, and garlic atop crostini. Fresh, juicy tomatoes burst with sweetness along with pungent garlic. The sweetness and acidity of the balsamic add another layer of flavor and fresh basil turns it up with herbaceous flair. Rating: 4.5/5

Brie and Marmalade Bites starts with a phyllo cup filled with orange marmalade, brie, and herbs. It is a light bite and would be great as a passed hors d’oeuvre for a wedding or corporate event. The creamy brie combined with the sweetness and citrus flavor of the marmalade pair perfectly together. Rating: 5/5

Caesar Salad is made with fresh romaine lettuce tossed with house-made Caesar dressing with anchovy. I love Caesar salad but it is very hard to find a place that makes it correctly. If you do not like anchovies, do not order a Caesar salad. It is just not a Caesar salad without it. Chef David makes a great Caesar salad dressing, not too thin and not too thick. The perfect viscosity to cling to the lettuce. I love that Chef David makes a crostini seasoned with butter, salt, and pepper instead of chunky, clunky croutons. It’s easier to eat and elevates the salad as well. Chef David, you need to bottle and sell that dressing! Rating: 5/5

Chicken Marsala is made with mushrooms, shallots, garlic, and parsley served over angel hair pasta. The chicken gently bathes in the sauce and really infuses the flavors into the chicken. It is tender and unlike any chicken marsala I’ve ever had. But that sauce is like liquid gold. It clings to the angel hair pasta like silk sheets. You can’t help but lick the plate afterwards. I could see this on a fine dining establishment’s menu. It is so refined and delicious! Rating: 5/5

Chocolate Fondant (Americans refer to this as a chocolate lava cake or molten chocolate cake) is basically a bi-product of a flourless chocolate cake and a soufflé. Chef David served his with macerated strawberries and strawberry coulis. If you go to my Instagram, I have a video of the chocolate “lava” flowing from the cake. I have tried many of these in my lifetime, but I think this was the best. I don’t know if it was because I had right out of the oven but it was just amazing! The perfect ending to a perfect meal! Rating: 5/5

text: We had a personal chef evening with David and Tillie. The experience could not have been better, and the four course meal was awesome. They were prompt, professional and exceptionally patient with our slightly rowdy crowd. We can't wait to hire them again next year.

name: Megan kim
text: A nice stop but more notable for the great fried chicken in the main sandwich.  I didn't like the slaw and would opt for naked as well as skip the other menu items.

resp.text: Hi Megan, not sure that this relates to our company, as we do not table service and do not sell fried chicken in sandwich.  We wish you well.

name: Cindy Sasek
text: Always a pleasure to work with Orange Beach Concierge!  This is our second year ordering from the Thanksgiving menu. They are always so helpful and extremely friendly. We love just walking in and having this wonderful feast all ready to go for the next day.  Couldn't be happier, instead of being stuck in the kitchen I get to enjoy the beach and relax knowing the Thanksgiving meal has been taken care of and will be a hit with my family

resp.text: It was nice to see you both yesterday.  Thank you for everything and Happy Thanksgiving to you all!

name: TingTing S
text:
This company cancelled the catering for our event on the day prior to the event, without so much as a courtesy phone call.

We tried to use this service to book a private dining experience. We booked the date and spoke about the menu on the phone on 10-18 and received an invoice for the cost on 10-19. The due date on the invoice was 10-21, the date of the event. I tried to pay it on 10-20, but the invoice was already deleted and our event cancelled.

As per their policy, events must be paid in full 10 days prior to the event unless agreed upon in writing. Being that I received an electronic invoice with a due date of 10-21, I had believed this to be the "in writing" agreement that the policy referenced.

I had no reason to doubt the date listed on the invoice and the owner didn't mention anything else about invoice due dates during our previous phone call. Upon inquiry, they stated that the reason for cancelling our event was because we hadn't paid the invoice, despite it not being yet due. On top of this, they didn't have the courtesy of giving me a phone call to tell me that they cancelled, despite the invoice not being yet due!

This is incredibly inconvenient as it leaves me no time to find an alternative caterer.

Do not rely on this team for your events unless you are willing to tolerate a last minute cancellation due to their poor management and communication.

resp.text: We at OBC provided our guidelines and policies to the client multiple times, contacted the client via email and also via text to try and resolve.  We have also made a recommendation for an additional group to complete and provide services requested.  This is a very unfortunate situation.  We have not heard back from the inquiry and can only hope that she has received the services she has requested from our recommendation.

name: Babbette Rask
text: I called this bizness a few days before thanksgiving to inquire about ordering there thanksgiving dinner already made & hireing a personal chef for another occasion, instead of answering my questions she rudely answered back ( it’s on our website ) like I was bothering her by asking anything & it’s really bad for any bizness to have someone with no people skills answering your phone ; so anyways I said forget it and hired the beach club to do my thanksgiving ; but I thought I would write an honest review on face book and instead of trying to resolve the issues they applied back by defending her and insulting me ; so I will never use them and if you want a great thanksgiving with no cooking call the beach club 😀( and obv) train your staff ASAP.

resp.text: Your unfortuante comments have been noted and our position will always be to be kind.  Happy Thanksgiving to you and yours.

name: Dave
text: Great food.  Great Service.  See you guys next time we are in OBA.

resp.text: Thank you for the kinds words, we are so grateful for your business and we hope to see you again next year!

name: Stephanie Christie
text: Chef David and Tillie provide outstanding service and made our family holiday gathering not only special, but stress-free! The menu was well-planned, flavorful and satisfying without being heavy. The sweet potatoes turned my husband into a sweet potato fan for life! Orange Beach Concierge is a family favorite. Thanks David and Tillie.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for the kind words.  We are grateful.

Orange Beach Concierge

name: Susan 2 G
text: Chef's dinner for 50th birthday, dinner for 30 for parents' 75th anniversary, Gourmet-to-go mexican dinner is my favorite mex ever--we could go on and on. We are clients ourselves, and recommend Orange Beach Concierge to the guests at our big luxury beach houses. They make us look good!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, we are grateful to be of service!

name: Sharon Grubbs
text: My friend from out of state contacted 333 Designs/Unforgettable Flowers to send me a specific kind of flower arrangement.  She was treated with such care and consideration!!! They went out of their way to send the perfect arrangement!  I was not familiar with them but will definitely recommend and use in the future. The arrangement is breathtaking❤️

name: Edward Melendez
text: A fantastic place to plan your next event from something small like a birthday to a corporate anniversary. They can take care of everything from your venue to photographer.

Dear Edward,
Thank you for your review. We loved that you used our services and that you recommend us.  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review, we know your time is valuable!
Wishing you the best,
Corrie and the 333 Team

name: Vickie Gesellschap
text: Corrie came through again!! On relatively short notice, she hit a home run for me with the delivery of 3 beautiful arrangements for a wedding shower I hosted. Her creativity in design showed through. Everyone commented on how beautiful the flowers were! Thanks, Corrie.

name: Kayla Schmaeling
text: In an absolute time crunch, and a last minute planned wedding, Corrie and 333 Designs swooped in and completely saved the day. While planning a quick, immediate family wedding in Charleston, Sc, Corrie was more than willing and happy to help anyway she could! She was able to create the most stunning bridal bouquet and boutonnière on a last minute request. She took my ideas and vision and made it even more beautiful than I had hoped! She packed everything up and hand delivered the arrangements the day we were set to leave - please note, she did this in about ZERO time and absolutely blew us away! The flower are now about a week and a half old and the bridal bouquet, set in water, is still holding strong! I can’t say enough about Corrie and 333 Designs - I highly recommend them!

name: Amy Mayfield
text: Corrie and her whole team worked to make our event look the best it's ever looked. We got rave reviews from our attendees and she went out of her way to ensure everything looked amazing!

name: Genevieve Vigil
text: Excellent customer service. We used 333 for our wedding, and my fiance and I were so busy in the weeks before the wedding we never really had time to meet with Corrie. But she was very accommodating and made time for us to call and email to get every detail arranged. Very good service. I can't wait to see her creations!

resp.text:
Dear Genevieve,
I loved designing your flowers and helping you with your wedding. It's my job to work around your busy schedule and help bring together all the details. You both were a pleasure to work with, and I loved seeing your photos!

Wishing you both the best!
Corrie and the 333 Team

name: Jareen Alam
text: From day one, Corrie Spearing of 333 Designs has helped both my husband and I to plan our wedding reception in Huntsville, Alabama. She is THE master planner and we are so thankful to have her by our side the entire time. Corrie was very easy to work with; she knew exactly what we had envisioned within our first meeting. This made things much simpler and smooth on our planning end. The moment we walked into our reception hall, both of us were in complete shock of how beautiful things were. My husband and I did absolutely nothing at our wedding reception, other than to enjoy the moment and actually get the chance to mingle with our friends and family. We even got to enjoy our dinner with family, and have cake! We are so grateful for that and will forever cherish these moments! Corrie did a fantastic job, and took this event under her arms as a true professional that she is in this line of career. She was easy to work with, talented, quick to reply, queen of multitasking, and just super awesome! Thank so much for everything! If ever again in the future we need a planner, we are coming right back to you!

resp.text:
Jareen,

What a joy to be a part of your special day! Thank you for taking the time to reply and leave us a review. We know your time is valuable and it means the world to us that you were pleased and let us know!

Sincerly,
Corrie and the 333 Designs team

name: Katie Chandler
text: We recently used 333 Designs for our wedding and were extremely disappointed with our experience. In meetings they seemed to understand exactly what was wanted, given exact pictures for some decorations and told things that the bride did not want to see anywhere. The day of my wedding I walked in to one of my locations and everything was the opposite of what I asked for. We did not receive what we feel we paid for at all and believe there was some time mismanagement which led to many things not being done properly. After the wedding we were billed an additional charge even though we had paid in full what the contract had said before our wedding. We will never choose to work with or recommend 333 designs again.

resp.text:
Dear Katie,
We are saddened by your review and to hear that after all that we did we were unable to make you happy.
We do our best to manage expectations, by design boards, detailed notes, as well as written out details in the final invoices. We understood your dreams and to be fair the final weeks leading to your big day your parents, and yourself, agreed to keep things in a more reasonable budget and made some changes. We had those changes clearly noted and approved before even ordering the flowers. Everyone saw the “Pinterest” style wedding and commented on how kind we were and how we went above and beyond what we were even contracted to do. The compliments from your family and friends and the many apologies for how we were treated by you were a testimony that we handled the wedding professionally and everything was beautiful. We hope that you can look back one day and see all the love and sacrifice everyone did to help make your wedding day come together and look so breathtaking.

Wishing you all the best and a wonderful marriage,
Corrie and the 333 Team
To see images from the wedding please click here: https://333designs.com/portfolio/katie-and-reed/

name: Madeline Creekmore
text: Corrie was fantastic to work with!  I would highly recommend her to ANYONE looking for a wedding or event coordinator.  She did day-of planning for me for my wedding a few weeks ago, and I couldn't have been happier with our decision to higher her.  When I first started planning my wedding, I did not think it was worth the money to higher a coordinator.  But as plans started to get more and more complex, I quickly realized that I was in over my head.  There were so many details to attend to on the day of the wedding, and I knew that I would not be in the right frame of mind to handle them myself.  Corrie listened to all of my ideas and executed them better than I could have myself.  Everything about my wedding day ran flawlessly because of her efforts, and my family and I were much more at ease and able to relax and enjoy the day knowing that Corrie had it under control.  My only regret from my wedding planning process was that I didn't hire her sooner to help me plan the whole thing! If you are looking for a fun and professional wedding coordinator, look no further, Corrie is your gal!   Oh... and did I tell you she did my hair???  She Did My Hair!  And it was GORGEOUS!

resp.text:
Madeline,
Looking back and reading reviews like this makes me so happy! I loved helping and taking stress off of everyones plate. Thank you for leaving such a wonderful review. We strive to help and provide a service like no one else! Glad I could help you with your hair too! It means so much to know that I was able to help you out during your special day!

Blessings,
Corrie and the 333 Team

name: Kelsey Greene
text: Corrie and the staff at 333 Designs were awesome!! They provided the flowers for our wedding and to say they were a hit would be an understatement. They were timely, professional, and a pleasure to work with. I would definitely recommend 333 Designs to any and everyone looking for a creative and fabulous florist!

resp.text:
Thanks for these kind words! Kelsey you were a joy to work with and we are so happy you were so pleased! Thank you for letting us be a part of your special day, and it's great to hear the flowers were a hit! Wishing you all the best.

-Kind regards, The team at 333 Designs

name: Wedding Chapel
text: Corrie and the entire team at 333 Designs are amazing to work with. Her floral arrangements are beyond gorgeous and her attention to detail is exceptional. As an owner of a business, it's great to work with people you can count on in putting together weddings and special events.

text: I can not disagree more with the last post. Cory took lots of time to make sure she know what my daughter wanted for her wedding. Corrie and the 333 Team

text: When my fiancée, now my wife, said she wanted to have a day-of wedding coordinator, I thought it would be a waste of money.  I COULD NOT HAVE BEEN MORE WRONG! 333 Designs

name: CORANDA AND CHARLES WIMS
text: If the bride wants a stress free coordinator, I would not recommend using 333 designs. resp.text: We want to assure you our team is happy to work with brides and grooms with any budget, Coranda, and we apologize if we gave off any other impression -- that was not our intent. It sounds like there was some definite miscommunication, and if you reach out to us privately, we'd love to answer any questions. Wishing you all the best. Kind regards, The team at 333 Designs

name: Cassie Shropshire
text: If the bride wants a stress free coordinator, I would not recommend using 333 designs. Corrie made the entire planning process stressful for both the bride and groom then insinuated on several occasions they were broke. It was absolutely disgusting and she was fired 2 weeks before the wedding because of her unprofessionalism.

resp.text:
This and the several reviews before and to follow are very sad. We have such a desire to serve and provide a service, however, we simply cannot provide services that our outside of our physical ability or contract.

This is one of the reasons we have contracts. -We provided everything in and according to contract, but the client had expectations and requirements that were far outside of our agreement, and they refused to pay more for the services they requested. Two weeks before when they still were requiring us to do more than we could, we felt it was best to walk away. We agreed to credit the couple back some of the money (even though we were not required to do so) and they could use the money how they felt they should. We also agreed that there would be no slander or malice on either side because we came to an agreement, and each party walked away content with these terms. If you would like more information in regards to this please let us know. If you are reading this know that we cannot  provide free services or labor,  and this couple was asking of us.

name: Sarah Melendez
text: Their team is amazing! They make everything so easy! We love you guys!

resp.text:
Sarah,

That's what we love to hear! We love helping making dreams come true and hope to make life so much easier!

Glad you are so pleased!!
Corrie (planner with 333 Designs)

name: Tammy Therriault
text: I'm so happy to be acquainted with 333 Designs.  Very professional and gets the job done right.  If there is a problem, she handles it very professionally and gets it corrected.

name: Erin Lindsey
text: I absolutely LOVED working with Corrie and Jessica from 333 Designs at the wedding we photographed this past weekend!! I highly recommend 333 Designs to every bride!

Erin,
You are an amazing photographer and a blessing to work with! Thank you for your referrals and kind review!

Corrie, Jessica and the 333 Team

name: Jane G.
text: I hired 333 Designs for both wedding coordinating and floral design 15 months prior to my daughter’s wedding day based upon recommendations and visits to two of her decorated venues.  During our first planning session Corrie used her computer to show both pricing options as well as flower and decoration ideas.  Her prices were favorable and she offered cost cutting suggestions.  We met many times throughout the 15 months prior to the wedding and tweeked the plans as needed.  The rehearsal was expertly directed by Corrie’s assistant Lauren giving me confidence in the ceremony.  Corrie and Lauren worked together during the ceremony and reception to ensure smooth transistions.  I was able to enjoy one of the happiest days of our lives without worry.  I highly recommend Corrie and 333 Designs.

resp.text:
We're thrilled to have been a part of one of the happiest days of your life!

Thanks for taking the time to share this with us. It was a pleasure working with you, and your daughter! Blessings on you all and their marriage!

-Kind regards, The team at 333 Designs

name: Bikhari Reyes
text: Corrie Spearing and her team at 333 designs are the greatest event planners that anybody could ask for. I have worked with Corrie and her team on multiple occasions, and they were very crisp, clean, punctual and thorough with their work. They have made wedding days for many different couples the best days of their life. She has yet to as much as mess up with a wedding. My employer at Cakes By Scelle Rey, LLC recommends 333 Designs to all of her clients, and I would too. YOU ROCK CORRIE!!!!

resp.text: You rock! Thanks for sharing this -- your support is appreciated. It's always a please working with you guys, and we hope to create more beautiful events in the future! Kind regards, The team at 333 Designs

name: Brighton Pollard
text: Corrie is not only a wonderful florist but an amazing person. She's such a kind, ambitious, and driven person and truly a pleasure to work with! I would have loved for her to be my planner but she was already booked as a planner for the day so BOOK THIS VENDOR IN ADVANCE!! For my wedding, I didn't really want a lot of flowers but just a TON of greenery and Corrie nailed it with just a few springs of lavender and thistle (which was such a unique feature) and then a few peonies and ranunculus for my bouquets and cake. The arbor was so beautiful it became kind of like a photo booth backdrop where all my guests took pictures through out the night. She set up draping and lights when I decided last minute and responded to my way too many emails in a prompt manner. I'm kind of a control freak =/ She even made last minute changes to the bridesmaids floral crowns to ensure I was happy the day of. I've highly recommended Corrie and 333 Designs to several of my friends and would to anyone who asked.

resp.text:
Brighton,

I have loved getting to know you and so glad we could continue after the wedding as friends. I love your photos and I am so glad you choose to work with us! Thank you for such a great review!

Sincerely,
Corrie and the 333 team

name: Nathanael Zurinsky
text: Corrie Spearing is the absolute worst wedding planner and florist.  She has no organizational skills and does not pay attention to details.  I have a complaint in with the better business bureau asking for a refund and she has not even attempted to apologize for ruining my wedding day.  I have documented evidence from receipts, to Corrie's own contract, to the wedding pictures, and wistness testimony stating all the things that she messed up at our wedding.  I have a total of over 31 documented items that she messed up on.  It was pointless to have Corrie for our wedding planner when we could have done all the work ourselves and saved almost $3K that we spent to not have to worry about all the things that she messed up.  For further information, please see a detailed list of items that were filed with the BBB that list out all the things that she messed up.  I would not recommend her to anyone!

resp.text:
Nathanael,

You're wedding day was beautiful and I am sad that you felt it was ruined. The photos turned out amazing and everyone said it was wonderful. We know that we went above and beyond, and we helped provide services that were not event listed in our contracts. We always strive to please and meet expectations, we are deeply saddened by your response. Blessings on your and your wife Mary. I hope you guys can one day see how magical the day was and appreciate the hours of work we provided for you at such an incredible rate.

Sincerely,
333 Designs

name: Brandi Furr
text: My mother always said if you don't have anything good to say, then don't say anything at all.

resp.text:
We are so sorry that you feel this way. As planners, we represent the client and we have to stand up for them even if it could hurt feelings.  You were hired to do a specific job, and as we appreciate your willingness to help, you did not provide the services that the client requested nor what we had discussed days before the event. If you were unable to provide the items you agreed to provide and would have let us know things could have gone more smoothly and my team and the catering staff would not have had to help you out so much. My client does not wish to pay more for services that they felt were done inadequately. We wish you all the best with your business and future endevours.

-Kind regards, The team at 333 Designs

name: Brittney Anderson
text: This venue is amazing! I just had my wedding here and the owners told us when we were first visiting that their primary goal was to make it a stress free day for everyone involved and they accomplished that exceedingly well! Their day of coordinator and DJ were also a pleasure to work with and made everything come together exactly the way we wanted. We moved our ceremony inside because of weather, but they allowed us to make that decision day of and flipped everything between the ceremony and reception flawlessly. Everything was beautiful. Everyone you will work with here knows what they're doing and knows how to do it well. And seriously- no stress. for anyone. even with a tropical storm rolling through. I highly recommend this venue to anyone looking for a perfect wedding day!

name: Alexander Manning
text: They're very nice and great to deal with. If I could have another wedding I would definitely do it again. Highly recommend!

name: Kathryn Graham
text: My friend got married here and it was so beautiful. They have so much to offer brides and grooms including decor in their packages which makes it easier to plan your wedding.

name: Keith Loden
text: Beautiful place, but employees hover, block off half of venue, charge extra on day of. Lost deposit because people were drinking in the groom's room. Didnt mess anything up.

name: Adam Swedenburg
text: This place is so beautiful and nice. The owners are friendly and very easy to work with. They will help you in any way that they can. The bridesmaids dressing room is in the main barn upstairs. The groomsmen dressing room is in the horse stables in a nice room. The place offers some decorations that they already have that you can choose from upstairs in a room.

name: Laigha Miller
text: Such a beautiful venue and the owners are so kind!!!

name: JD Johnson
text: the parking attendant was rude.. they also rushed us off after the reception was over.. beautiful location only a few other issues

name: Renea D
text: This place is beautiful and the owner is so nice to work with.

name: Maxine Downing
text: My family has used Fergusons for decades and I know why. I ordered a blanket for my mother's funeral and it contained what I requested but I left the rest to them and it was stunning! I also received numerous arrangements for the occassion from Fergusons as well and they were absolutely beautiful. When I placed my order, I was assured they would take care of me (as I was nervous because I was ordering for my family) and they did not disappoint, nor have they ever. They are my go-to florist for anything local.

name: Stacey Garmon
text: Wes did a fabulous job on flowers for my daughter’s wedding.  Good price, EXCELLENT customer service.

name: Seneka Stokes
text: I order a floral arrangement for my Mother for Mother’s Day and it started dying after two days. Not only that, the floral arrangement I asked for was nowhere near as full as the one I saw on the website. When I went to pick the arrangement up and asked about its fullness, I was told that the flowers would bloom once they get warm. Some of the small roses that were in the arrangement were broken when I picked it up. There was green floral tape around the top rim of the vase which could have been easily concealed with a nice ribbon. It was so much green foam in the bottom of the small sized vase. That may be why the flowers aren’t lasting as they don’t have enough room and are poorly cut and crammed in. We put the few flowers that we could salvage in a larger vase. It’s unfortunate that I paid $66 dollars for an arrangement that my mother will only get to enjoy for a few days. I have Walmart flower bouquets that are outlasting these. I usually buy special occasion flowers from Publix at a cheaper price and better quality work, but I wanted to patronize Ferguson’s florist because they are a locally owned business. However I will not use their service again because it seems as though the work was rushed and thrown together and just not worth the money.

name: Tashara Janae
text:
I have been ordering flowers for my mother every two weeks since the unfortunate passing of her husband. The flowers have not been up to par. We went to the florist today to return the flowers. When they arrived they were cut too short, looked nothing like the picture and were drooping and dying after two days. We arrived with a photo of the online order and were told that there was a shortage of flowers and they “substituted.” However, the substitution was poor quality. The owner, Noah Ferguson, came
To speak with us. He was rude, condescending and spoke disrespectfully to me and my mother. I will NEVER order from Ferguson again. I will be reporting this business to the BBB.

name: Enga Sturns
text: They are very nice people but the wait time was a little frustrating

name: Tony Lesser
text: Fast and friend. Will use again

name: Cindy Camp
text: I liked the white banner and bow for my friends mom for the front door

name: Tolly Walker
text: Great flower selection.

name: Katherine Parks
text: I got my dress and flowers there they were so helpful

name: Seasoned Swine
text:
The flowers for the funeral in May were exceptional. Honestly the prettiest flower arrangements I had ever laid eyes on. This last weekend an artificial arrangement was picked up for her headstone. I have to boast of how real and professional they looked. If anyone is considering going anywhere else in Alabama don't do it! :)

Thank you very much for all you have done this year!

name: Michael Harper
text: We had the most beautiful flowers from your shop. We had lost one of our granddaughters , I wanted them to be very beautiful for her and they were, again thank you very much.

name: Randy Martin
text: My daughter was married here April 19. We let Linda and Lori handle most everything from minister, D.J. and photos. The Azalea's were in bloom which made for gorgeous photos. The food was delicious and the arrangements and flowers were awesome. Thank you so much for a job well done and so stress free.

name: gaige tedder
text: I needed a special bouquet for a very special lady in my life, and I had a list of very particular flowers that I wanted in the bouquet. A few of the flowers were hard to come by due to the time of year, and I needed the bouquet in three days and Ferguson pulled it off! All 23 flowers were there and beautifully arranged. I will definitely be using Ferguson for all of my flower needs.

name: Brenda Bone
text: Friendly staff, always there to help you. Traded with them all my life and my parents did too.

name: bnbskaggs
text: Wonderful business with great service. They always have endless varieties of flowers and I love that they are open 7 days a week.

name: Amber Rigsby-Bellew
text: Made a corsage for my last minute son on the spot. Very appreciated!!

name: FireBerlin
text: It's so hard choosing a florist from out-of-state. I went with Ferguson Florist for a flower arrangement for my aunt who has lived in Attalla all of her life. She LOVED the arrangement, said it was the prettiest she had ever received. Her sister later confirmed that Ferguson Florist does very nice work.

name: Shirley Briggs
text: I received an arrangement from Ferguson’s and it Wes absolutely beautiful and the real test is if the flowers last a week they sure have thank you

name: Tammy
text: I want to say Thank You for doing a wonderful job on a floral arrangement that was done for my Mom and Dad's anniversary to put on Mom's gravesite.I had went to several florists trying to find the perfect arrangement and was very disappointed and didn't think I would find what I was looking for until I walked into Ferguson's.Everyone at Ferguson's was very polite and so willing to do their best at helping me to make sure I got the perfect arrangement to please my Dad.When my Dad went to pick it up the next day he was extremely happy with the arrangement.Ferguson's Florist has gotten two customer's that will only use Ferguson's for any arrangements we need from now on.If anyone wants to be pleased with beautiful arrangements and very polite,caring people then Ferguson's is the place to go.

name: Sebrina Crosby
text: I have never left a review for anything, good or bad, but the treatment I received from Ferguson Florist was so abhorrent, I felt compelled to not only leave a review but file a formal complaint with the BBB. I placed an order via their website to be delivered to a location clearly listed as one of the areas they service. A few hours later, I receive a call that they cannot deliver to that area. After being handed off to the manager, before I could even speak, the manager was SCREAMING at me that I'd have to pay 2.5 times the delivery fee that the website listed (which was determined after putting in the exact location). She said she didn't care if I got the flowers or not because I wasn't the one making them, they were.  She continued to scream and berate me. I have never, ever been treated so poorly by anyone, let alone anyone in any sort of customer service sector. The thing is, I would've paid the increase in the delivery fee, but it was the screaming and berating me, without even letting me explain what their own website said, that was so awful and upsetting.

name: Doug
text: I ordered a peace lilly for a funeral service.  They did not deliver the plant to the funeral home.  They refuse to own up to their mistake like a reputable business would and insinuate that the funeral home, my family and I are not being truthful.

name: James Roberts
text: Always has a good selection of flowers.

name: Gina Farley
text: I have asked for unique arrangements from Ferguson's and they have gone above and beyond every time. Excellent customer service!

name: Logan Barnard
text: We have used Ferguson’s many times over the years and have had no complaints. My family ordered several arrangements from Furgeson’s and several other from other florists but only the Ferguson’s arrangements were wilted or mush within 24 hours at the funeral home. Furguson’s blames the funeral home heating however the other arranments were unaffected. I’ve never experienced this before but considering the amount of money involved I will take my business elsewhere in the future.

text: Always beautiful!  Birthday, prom, funeral, whatever the occasion, Ferguson Florist never disappoints us.

name: Ruby Page
text:
I hosted a couples wedding shower and planned on around 20 to 25 people. Around 3 in the afternoon on Saturday the day before the shower which was on Sunday. I realized I had totally forgotten about tables and chairs.

I messaged Shoals Event Specialist with my fingers crossed that someone would be available to help since almost all of the other party rental places were closed on the weekend and with it being such short notice, I wasn't holding my breath.

Not only did they answer, but they were very pleasant and helped me figure out how many tables and chairs I would need and delivered everything and picked it all back up after the party.

Shoals Event Specialist truly saved the day!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Blair! It was great meeting you and your family!

name: Amber Edwards
text: I hired them as the DJ for my Wedding two weeks ago and the did not disappoint. The did set up their systems on time and every music they played was wonderful.

text: I definitely give these boys a five star rating. text: these boys played at a Halloween party. They kept playing that fire, and I couldn’t stop dancing.

name: Matthew Conde
text: TOP NOTCH FLORIST! Bella Blooms is always on the spot with providing excellent, quick service with a reasonable price! They are very creative when it comes to their floral designs (not just flowers in a vase). Highly recommend!

name: Peyton Gans Booth
text: I just got married on Halloween and I was shocked by the magic Jason & Michelle worked for me!! Honestly the most beautiful floral arrangements I'd ever seen. I received so many compliments. Jason is SO easy to talk to and listened to all of my requests. HIGHLY recommend!!

text: This is the real deal florist. They have the best service and the best flower arrangement my wife has ever seen. I used to go to Homewood to get her flowers but not any more. This place is worth the drive

name: Amy B
text: Beautiful flowers and very kind staff. Highly recommend!

name: carla irwin
text: Desiree and Kat were so amazing to us and the flowers were beyond amazing.  They were a true part of our wedding in every sense and I will miss talking with them.  I feel like we found not only a brilliant florist, but we found friends.  They took our vision and made it a reality.

name: Mary Hales-Ward
text: Being unable to attend a family funeral, I wanted to send something heartfelt and beautiful.  They did not disappoint.  The spray was outstanding and beautiful.  They completed it and delivered it in a timely manner and my expectations were exceeded.  I am so thankful I found them.

name: gabrielle byrd
text: Incredibly talented and incredibly helpful! I loved my flower arrangements and it was such a quick and easy process!

name: Janis Laws
text: I live in NC and my sweet daughter-in-law lost her grandmother.  I had no idea what florist to contact, but I was very impressed with this website.  The gentleman answering the phone was extremely nice and helpful, and even offered to deliver the plant to her home when he got off work at 5:00.  I am very glad I chose this place.  He did exactly what he said he would do and my daughter-in-law said the plant was beautiful.  Thank you for the great customer service, Bella Blooms and Designs.

name: Shelley Carrigan
text: I ordered a basket and was a given a janky wood box with stems as the handles. The flowers were not vibrant and colorful, but they were dark and dull. On top of being unhappy with the flowers- Rodd Sinclair made it worse. His attitude is going to ruin this business. I'll order from Alabaster florist next time...I dont think they would hang up on me.... lets not forget to mention that they deleted my yelp review.

name: Mark Stephenson
text: Great job especially for a last minute call! She loved them

name: Patrick Lee
text: Stopped in to get flowers sent to my wife on Valentine's Day. They were delightful to deal with, and the flowers looked amazing. Would absolutely recommend them to anyone in the area.

name: Lori Daza
text:
AMAZING customer service. Very easy to work with, friendly, courteous, knowledgeable... I can go on and on about how amazing they are but everyone should go find out more by choosing this place for your floral/gift needs! You will not be disappointed.
Rod went above and beyond for me when I called to make an order. I've honestly never had a better experience with a company. He was extremely accommodating and very very helpful; not to mention the flowers I ordered looked absolutely beautiful!
The quality of my bouquet was more than I expected.
Will definitely come back!

name: tesla nichole
text: I used Pelham Flowers for the first time today to send Mother's Day flowers. They were very helpful when I called and worked with my budget. The arrangement they put together and sent was beautiful!! It was so much better than I had even expected. I will definitely used Pelham Flowers again. I recommend you try them, also!

name: Ellen Fleisher
text: Excellent!!! My husband and I used Pelham Flowers by Desiree for all our wedding and rehearsal flowers. We LOVED her work. She helped us create the perfect look we were hoping for at great price.She offered creative suggestions and was extremely professional.  I have used Pelham Flowers for several events and bought flowers from her for friends and family. Desiree is creative and wonderful to work with. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for an awesome florist!

name: Henry Collins
text: The best place to get flowers. They are known for their modern and funky flower designs. I got flowers for my girlfriend from Pelham Flowers By Desiree last year for Valentines and it was absolutely gorgeous. Their products are by far the best priced among the flower shops in Birmingham area. The best thing I like about them are they use flowers from local growers around Jefferson and Shelby county. When you buy flowers from them you are actually contributing to the local economy. How cool is that? I ordered my flowers from them again this year to be delivered to my girlfriends work. I am excited to see their creation.

name: Mo Pop
text: Desiree did my wedding flowers and they were so beautiful! I couldn't have asked for better! The colors were perfect and they were so unique! Love this florist and will definitely use them again!

name: Jennifer Jacobs
text: I cannot recommend Flowers By Desiree enough. I am in Charleston, SC and I was trying to arrange a flower delivery for a family member who needed a bright spot in her day. The staff members were so helpful and explained what flowers they had available and delivered them to her just a few hours later. The descriptions did not do the flowers justice they were just beautiful!!! Thank you so much Flowers By Desiree!!!!!

name: Melissa Lesueur
text:
Pelham  Flowers by Desiree  and her staff are very nice, and their work is Amazing! I contacted Desiree to do a blanket of silk flowers for my Mother's funeral. My Brother's and I  met the with Desiree and gave her our Idea of what we wanted and the budget. Once we saw the flowers we were blown away of how amazing the flowers looked so real. This lady is very talented, and  you can tell that she absolutely loves what she does. Desiree went above and beyond our expectations!
We will not use any one else!

name: Pam Chut
text: My husband recently surprised me with a bouquet from Pelham Flowers by Desiree.  Beautiful flowers and super fresh.  Love them!  Still fresh as new five days later.

name: Cliff Chappell
text: I ordered flowers for a funeral, and they were very helpful in offering suggestions over the phone. The flowers were awesome.  I will definitely order from there again.  I highly recommend them and will recommend them to anyone I know needing flowers.  Thanks for the great service and product.

name: Jason Moore
text: Best place in Birmingham to get your flowers! Unique floral designs and great service! I highly recommend this florist to all my friends!

name: joseph sowder
text: Great florist. Have used for more than 1 wedding venue. Would use again.

name: Dr Kelsey Graham
text: A couple of our neighbors graciously sent a plant to my wife who has a lengthy hospital stay.  I give the low rating here for two reasons- 1. A professional would have first checked with the hospital to ensure that plants or flowers were allowed. In my wife's case NONE are allowed on the entire floor where she is being kept. The plant was simply left at the nurses station and the staff of Pelham Flowers simply skipped away happily counting their dollars regardless of whether the intended party could ever enjoy the purchase or not. 2. The card that was placed on the plant is an over the top advertisement for Pelham Flowers. It is nothing more than a business brochure with a small print line indicating who the intended benefactor of the plant is.  Welcome to Amerika home of the god $$$$$ humans be damned! Money rules in spite of delivery or not. And please let us over promote ourselves in hospitals all around town by using the greeting card as nothing more than a advertisement!!!! Yeah!!!! No thanks. Totally inconsiderate and thoughtless taking of money- pure greed Amerikan style.

name: Karla Watson
text: I love the friendly employees and their smalltown ideals! They are willing to go above and beyond to please their customers. Most of all, the flowers are GORGEOUS!! They can arrange them in any style you like...just ask them!! :)

name: Alan Thomas
text: The arrangement was wonderful, delivery timing was perfect, and everything had such a personal and caring touch.  Desiree really put together something wonderful, and I wish I could post a picture of the gorgeous arrangement she created for me.  The wife loved it, and her coworkers were jealous.  I'm sure next time they get flowers sent to them, they will tell their boyfriends and husbands to call Desiree.

name: Miles Akins
text: From the groom's perspective - we were on a budget for our wedding.  We met with 3 other florists before Desiree, and they all said they had ideas to keep us in budget, but their quotes said otherwise.  Then we contacted Desiree, and she really did have great budget-minded ideas that kept my checkbook happy.  I picked up the flowers myself the day of the wedding (to save some more cash). They were packed and ready to go when I arrived, and I was back on the road in no time.  Most importantly, my stressing bride instantly calmed down when she saw how beautiful the flowers turned out.  The flowers looked great in bouquets, on the tables and chairs, and on the cake.  My wife dried some of her bouquet and we placed them in frames on the wall.  I would definetely purchase flowers again from Desiree in a heartbeat.  Highly recommended.

name: Debbie Atchley
text: We chose Flowers by Desiree after receiving one of their arrangements.  They were so helpful and the arrangement we ordered was beautiful.  Their shop is filled with goodies too!

name: Bridgette Pertile
text: My flowers were beautiful and the service was outstanding and very personable!!!  My daughter loved them!  I will definitely be using them for all my future flower needs.

name: Lloyd Winger
text: Unfortunately  I received my bouquet during the recent severe cold spell.  My beautiful arrangement was damaged by the low temp.  Greg from Pelham Flowers by Desiree said they wanted to work with me and make it right.  I greatly appreciate how they handled my situation.  A replacement floral bouquet was offered along with a refund to the sender.  Because of this attitude I will not only return to this business but highly recommend them.  Thank you! P. Winger

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Beautiful work! Will be using Desiree for all my floral needs

name: Jan Davis
text: Real cute place, very hard workers.

name: Ryan Harmon
text: Google hours are wrong. They were closed when I arrived. Hours on weekdays are until 4pm

name: DeAnne Daniels

name: Angel Druse
text:
We hired Chris with Kathleen’s Catering for our daughter’s wedding this weekend and it was by far the best food we have EVER had at a wedding. He made the whole process of planning the menu, taste testing and day of the wedding so stress free.
Even with the many changes and additions that I made, he was always professional and very quick with calls or emails.
His Individual banana pudding was the biggest hit at the wedding.
His staff was exceptional!
We will definitely use Kathleen’s Catering for any other future needs we have.
I highly recommend Chris with Kathleen’s Catering!

text:
I hired Chris from Kathleens Catering and Chocolate Shop for the grooms cake for my son’s recent wedding. My son didn’t want a traditional grooms cake instead he wanted white chocolate bread pudding with raspberry and chocolate drizzle. He gave us the opportunity to come for a tasting and tweaked the recipe until we were satisfied. Everyone raved about the bread pudding! He served it for us and was professional and a delight to work with. I highly recommend him, you will not be disappointed!

Melanie Brake

name: Russell Gay
text: This is a place you need to eat at, so you can say you ate there before it became famous! 😆 Homestyle food served quick. Rib meat fell off the bone, meatloaf like your Grandma used to make, and reasonably priced! I don't know where they get their food because it doesn't taste like it came from a restaurant service company. Seriously, check it out!

text: I finally found my dream SUPREME SWEET PICKLE with or without heat from Bloom and Petal. It is crisp, thick cut and takes 14 days to prepare to perfection. I was a bit concerned to order that many glass jars from another state, however Vince and Aimee did an amazing job of packaging and delivery was swift and flawless! They are an absolute joy to work with and even helped me with ordering more to stock up with in the future. If only more business were so helpful and eager to assist their customers in their guilty pleasures of such a delicious pickle! Thank you so much you two for laughing with me instead of at me! ❤  More business definitely to come with this phenomenal place in good ole' Alabama...GIVE these phenomenal PERFECT PICKLES from Bloom and Petal A TRY!!!👍👍

resp.text: Thank you so much!

text: My orders were above and beyond my expectations. The two orders were absolutely wonderful. I recommend them to anyone wanting to send something beautiful to someone special.

text: Absolutely beautiful! Ordered these for a coworker's birthday. Ordered them through the online process and it was efficient and easy. The person that answered was super helpful and nice. She told the the delivery driver was out with our delivery, but she would make sure she got in touch with him to give our instructions. The delivery was made in the right amount of time and our coworker was so excited. The bouquet is gorgeous, the flowers look vibrant and fresh! Absolutely recommend Bloom & Petal and will definitely use them in the future.

resp.text: Thank you for the great rating!

name: Janna Gobeo
text: Everything was perfect! The Box of Joy was "a nice surprise on this gloomy day...this was such a nice bit of sunshine," according to the recipient.  This is at least the third time I've ordered from Bloom and Petal for my daughter in law's important occasions  "and they are always so beautiful and smell so good." This gift box included very thoughtful comfort items - flowers, chocolate, bath things.  I sent it in memory of a year's anniversary of a sweet canine companion's passing. Everything from Bloom and Petal is extraordinary quality - the bright bouquets, the prompt delivery, and the customer service. Outstanding!  Thank you for providing love to our loved ones when we are so far away from them.

text: Excellent service and an absolutely beautiful flower arrangement was sent to my friend!! I live out of town but they took great care of me!! Will definitely use again!
